籩字的基本解释

籩
biān
见“笾”。

籩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［biān］
［《廣韻》布玄切，平先，幫。］
“1”的今字。亦作“臱2”。“笾1”的繁体字。
古代祭祀和宴会时盛果脯的竹器，形状像木制的豆。

籩字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　籩； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页905第37
【廣韻】布元切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?眠切，?音邊。竹豆。【爾雅·釋器】竹豆謂之籩。【疏】籩，以竹爲之，口有籐緣，形制如豆，亦受四升，盛棗、栗、桃、梅、蔆芡、脯脩、膴鮑、糗餌之屬，祭祀、燕享所用。【詩·豳風】籩豆有踐。【儀禮·士冠禮】旨酒令芳，籩豆有楚。【左傳·昭六年】季孫宿如晉，晉侯享之，有加籩。【註】籩豆之數多于常禮。　又官名。【周禮·天官】籩人奄一人，女籩十人。【疏】女籩，女奴之曉籩者。

籩字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［biān］
["Guangyun" Buxuanqie, Pingxian, help. ]
The present character of "1". Also known as "臱2". Traditional characters for "笾1".
In ancient times, the bamboo utensils used to hold preserved fruits at rituals and banquets were shaped like wooden beans.
basket for fruits
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo Character Department] 　笾; Kangxi Strokes: 24; Page Number: Page 905 Page 37
[Guang Yun] Bu Yuan Qi [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Mian cut, sound edge. Bamboo beans. 【Erya·Release Device】Bamboo beans are called 笾. [Sparse] bamboo, with vine edges in the mouth, shaped like a bean, and also affected by four liters, jujube, chestnut, peach, plum, water chestnut, preserved fruit, mutton abalone, embarrassed bait, ritual, Yan Enjoy what you use. [Poetry·Binfeng] There is practice in the bean curd. [Rituals·Shiguan Ceremony] The purpose of wine is to make Fang Fang, and the beans have Chu. [Zuo Zhuan·Sixth Year of Zhao] Ji Sun Su Ru Jin, Jin Hou Xiang Zhi, and Jia Wu. [Note] There are more Wing Beans than Chang Li.　Also official name. 【Zhou Li·Tianguan】There are maidens of one person and ten females. 【Sparse】Nv Vie, the Xiao Vie of a female slave.
